basics.name: Jose Ricardo Ramirez Varon
basics.label: Web developer
basics.summary: System engineer:with good command of the English language and experience working with technologies such as:React, Node.js, MongoDB and MySQL

work.summary: I managed the technological area of this company, whose purpose is to educate, train, qualify and certify all the collaborators of the Bonaverense community in the protection of port facilities.

highlights.content: Automated creating and sending database-related files using Visual Basic for Applications. This reduced course registration time by 75%.
highlights.highlight: This reduced course registration time by 75%.

highlights.content: Developed a weekly update system using Visual Basic for Applications to prevent certificate forgery and ensure certificate authenticity for partners and users.
highlights.highlight: ensure certificate authenticity for partners and users

work.company: Centro de Entrenamiento para Trabajo Seguro en Alturas CDETSA
work.summary: I was responsible for the optimization of the enterprise database to ensure efficient certification of this center's clients.

highlights.content: Automated the generation of multiple files required for the daily workday, reducing the workload by 40%.

projects.name: Organic & Chemical
projects.description: Landing page for a new fertilizer company located in Cundinamarca Colombia, Kilometer 14 - via Mosquera, la mesa Cundinamarca.

projects.name: PIO final project (TeamFlow)
projects.description: Web application designed using the MERN stack that allows collaborative and efficient task management.

publications.name: Insights. Tecnología, Sociedad y Educación: Institución Educativa Simón Bolívar
publications.publisher: Universidad del pacifico - Grupo de Investigación e innovación tecnológica

points.content: My name is Jose Ricardo. I began my journey in the world of software development while studying Systems Engineering, where I discovered my true passion—not just programming, but designing solutions and automating processes to reduce repetitive work and minimize errors.
highlights: designing solutions and automating processes to reduce repetitive work and minimize errors.

points.content: Currently, I'm developing projects focused on optimizing process management in work environments where I've had the privilege of collaborating.
highlights: optimizing process management in work environments

points.content: One of my key accomplishments has been enhancing the efficiency of multiple local businesses that rely on Excel as their primary database. Through the use of VBA, I have automated their daily operations, streamlining workflows and significantly boosting productivity.
highlights: I have automated their daily operations, streamlining workflows and significantly boosting productivity.

points.content: As a web developer, my goal is to take these optimizations to the next level. To achieve this, I am conducting an in-depth analysis of the business environment of these local companies, aiming to design a comprehensive system that enables them to manage their processes efficiently and scalably.
highlights: my goal is to take these optimizations to the next level.
design a comprehensive system that enables them to manage their processes efficiently and scalably.
